headline: 2025-10-30 — DTE Energy raised its five‑year capital investment plan by $6.5 billion, taking the five‑year plan to $36.5 billion (five‑year capital plan increased by $6.5B to $36.5B).

2025-10-27 — Singapore's Economic Development Board announced allocation of additional land on Jurong Island, including designation of a new data‑centre park (1 data‑centre park) and additional land for renewable energy facilities.
2025-10-29 — Siemens Energy AG neared completion of a 500‑ton turbine for a natural‑gas power plant in its Berlin assembly hall (completion of a 500‑ton turbine after several weeks of work).

2025-10-28 — European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde called for deeper capital markets to mobilize financing for Europe’s green transition (policy push to expand capital‑market capacity to meet the region’s green financing needs).

2025-10-30 — Bloomberg Intelligence analysts Mandeep Singh and Robert Biggar reported a sector shift toward AI inference workloads, signaling increased commercial demand for inference infrastructure (analyst note forecasting a measurable workload shift from training to inference).

2025-10-29 — Engineers at Siemens Energy reported multi‑week work to assemble a 500‑ton turbine, indicating near‑term manufacturing throughput of at least one 500‑ton gas‑turbine unit in central Berlin (assembly of a 500‑ton unit completed after weeks of work).
